What is Practica?

Help you transition into your dream job

Educate you using real world experience

Connect you to mentors and experts in your dream field

Provide your company a platform for talent



CEOs are concerned about the availability
of key skills to their growth prospects


According to our online survey,
97% of Students and Professionals
are willing to accept unpaid micro projects.
